column5: Sportsman's Warehouse sporting goods store is having a upcoming event that many of you may be interested in, called Canada Days held on Feb. 16 and 17. Free trip give a ways. If a store location is near you be a good way to possiblity win a trip to Canada. The link below has the stores invloved in this event and other info reguarding this:http://www.sportsmanswarehouse.com/e...anada_days.cfm
